title: Pressure mounts on Paul Ryan to run for House speaker
text: Several Republicans have pushed for Paul Ryan to run for House speaker, including Kevin McCarthy, who pulled out of the race on Thursday. Speaking on Friday,... guardian.co.uk 5 hours ago - World WASHINGTON (AP) — The pressure is on Rep. Paul Ryan, the GOP vice presidential nominee in 2012, to run for House speaker in the chaotic aftermath of Majority...
